attributes.action: Stop using the threat of terror to pass laws that are illiberal and ineffective
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Terrorism is a crime, it is not something to wage war against, nor is it something with which to define the entire political sphere. This government has been using fear of terrorism to pass laws that remove human rights and civil liberties for no long term benefit.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop using the threat of terror to pass laws that are illiberal and ineffective."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12183.asp

Prime Minister's Office
